title: Can't install mumble because of snapshot uninstall!
body:
Trying to install mumble-1.2.4-178-g2c892fe
The 1.2.5 installer starts, i choose the client only, closes all applications (as it should).

Then it says "Status:  Program is being removed" and it requests me to locate mumble-1.2.4-rc1-8-gb115a29.msi which i have no copy of nor can i find one. (Tried locate32 and found nothing)

So i took to "drastical" measures and removed all registry keys marked murmur/mumble, i removed all files on the drive that Mumble tries to start (iosnoop) and still i can't install Mumble 1.2.5 because of this bloody MSI file.

What to do?


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1057/ .*
